items.content_html: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. Instead of leaving your email exposed in plain HTML (where bots can easily grab it), this script dynamically inserts it using JavaScriptâ€”making it way harder for scrapers to detect.

items.content_html: Potara is a lightweight, easy-to-use proxy manager that allows you to combine multiple local ports under a single endpoint. It's perfect for developers working with microservices, multiple APIs, or any scenario where you need to route different services through a unified interface.

items.content_html: An online C++ compiler built with Node.js that allows users to write, compile, and execute C++ code in real-time via a secure REST API. The Online C++ Compiler is a web-based tool that allows users to write, compile, and execute C++ code in real-time. It provides a secure and lightweight execution environment without install cpp on your machine.

items.content_html: Lazy CSS is a lightweight, utility-first CSS framework that generates styles on-demand as you use them in your HTML or JSX. It offers a Tailwind-like experience but with a "lazy" approach, minimizing CSS overhead. Supports vanilla JS and React, with easy configuration and a wide range of pre-defined utilities and color palettes.
items.title: Bhargavxyz738/Lazy-CSS: Lazy CSS is a lightweight, utility-first CSS framework that generates styles on-demand as you use them in your HTML or JSX.  It offers a Tailwind-like experience but with a "lazy" approach, minimizing CSS overhead.  Supports vanilla JS and React, with easy configuration and a wide range of pre-defined utilities and color palettes.

items.content_html: ng-react-bridge is a lightweight Angular package that enables seamless integration of React components into Angular applications. It uses a directive to render React components, allowing dynamic prop passing and compatibility with standalone Angular components. This tool is ideal for hybrid projects needing both frameworks.
items.title: john310897/ng-react-bridge: ng-react-bridge is a lightweight Angular package that enables seamless integration of React components into Angular applications. It uses a directive to render React components, allowing dynamic prop passing and compatibility with standalone Angular components. This tool is ideal for hybrid projects needing both frameworks.
